thread.title: Easter Sunday With a Latin Family
thread.title_full: Easter Sunday With a Latin Family | POPSUGAR Latina

author: Vivian Nunez
title: Easter Sunday With a Latin Family
text:
If we're honest, the end of Lenten season is about honoring religious traditions, but it's also (mostly) about celebrating family in a big, sweet way. And when we talk about family get-togethers as Latinos, we know that this means â€” dressing up, lots of food , a large group of "family" members, and speaking over the soundtrack of the day . Here are 11 stages a Latina might experience over Easter Sunday.
